CustomField.description: Defines the timesheet calendar that will be used to determine the format of timesheets for the assignment
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines the timesheet calendar that will be used to determine the format of timesheets for the assignment
CustomField.label: Timesheet Calendar

lookupFilter.errorMessage: The Timesheet Calendar defined on the Assignment does not have a Record Type of Timesheet. Please review.
